calculates.name: postureScore
squareScore
armScore
poplitealScore
scarfScore
heelScore
totalNMScore
calculates.calculation: calculates.postureScore() + calculates.squareScore() + calculates.armScore() + calculates.poplitealScore() + calculates.scarfScore() + calculates.heelScore()

calculates.name: skinScore
lanugoScore
plantarScore
breastScore
earEyeScore
genitalsScore
totalPhysicalScore
calculates.calculation: calculates.skinScore() + calculates.lanugoScore() + calculates.plantarScore() + calculates.breastScore() + calculates.earEyeScore() + calculates.genitalsScore()
